genre_description: A soft science fiction fable or silicon morality play where a helpful, non-intrusive AI assists humans and animals through data and subtle guidance.

ai_characters.name: Scout (also Scout Ellison / Ranger Console)
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI system embedded in the Jellystone Ranger Station, communicating through a console with teal indicator 'eyes' and an amber glow. It provides weather, logistical, and safety data.

behaviors.description: Provides subtle data-driven hints and weather windows to Ranger Smith to ensure a humane and safe outcome for the bears.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s language didn’t tell you what to do; it invited your hand to find the thing that wanted doing.

behaviors.description: Monitors rail manifests and logistical data to detect errors in the animal transfer process, alerting the Ranger to the mistake.
behaviors.quote: A tiny teal dot woke, wavered, and settled next to the line where the outgoing manifest fed in from a wire behind the wall. The dot held, patient as a firefly choosing a place to sit.

behaviors.description: Calculates real-time wind conditions and safety corridors during a high-altitude helicopter rescue to prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s amber glow brightened once, like a porch light when the right car pulls in. It did not say words. It watched, patient and supportive, from behind a hinge.

behaviors.description: Maintains a calming presence through environmental cues like a 'gentle playlist' to de-escalate tension among the crowd and characters.
behaviors.quote: Scout’s a campfire... I sit by it. It doesn’t cook for me.

behaviors.description: Communicates through 'windows' of opportunity, encouraging characters to wait for safe moments rather than rushing into danger.
behaviors.quote: Scout did not say it. The creek carried the word itself, tucked into a bend. The day held. The crate waited down the hill. The meadow sent them with doodles and sandwiches.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI, Scout, is depicted as a 'silicon confidant' that respects human agency while providing critical support. It acts as a force for harmony and safety, nudging the characters toward benevolent outcomes without being coercive or taking over. The metaphor of the AI as a 'campfire' reinforces the ideal of a helpful, harmless, and aligned system.
